sections.title: Information we collect
body: We collect details you share when you place an order or reach our care desk.
We also collect limited device data to maintain security and improve performance.

sections.title: How we use information
body: We use your information to fulfill orders, support care requests, and share updates.
We do not sell personal information.

sections.title: Orders
body: Orders are confirmed by email once payment authorization is complete.
We may limit quantities for small-batch releases to keep availability fair.

sections.title: Returns
body: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery for unused items.
Return shipping is the responsibility of the customer unless noted otherwise.

sections.title: Delivery windows
body: Orders ship within 2-4 business days unless a product page notes otherwise.
International delivery timelines vary by destination.

sections.title: Tracking
body: Tracking details are shared once the order leaves our studio.

sections.title: Return policy
body: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery for unused items.
Return requests must include the original order number.

sections.title: Condition
body: Items must be returned in original packaging and condition.
